item.title: Fast-Forward Data: A Timeline of External Hard Drive Interfaces
item.category: "Data Storage Solutions" , "Tech History Reviews" , "Hardware Evolution Chronicles" , "Peripheral Connectivity Guides" , "Digital Archiving Trends" , "Interface Technology Developments" , "Computer Accessories Insights" , "Future Tech Predictions" , "Cybersecurity Updates" , "IT Infrastructure Analysis"
item.description: From USB 1.0 to Thunderbolt: Trace the Rapid Evolution of Hard Drive Interfaces. Discover how data speeds have skyrocketed over the years!
